_ZclTransferDataPayload_t Struct Reference

Format of the TransferData Command Payload. See ZigBee Smart Energy Profile Specification r17, Figure D.40 or D.46. More...

#include <zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h>

Data Fields

uint16_t tunnelId
uint8_t data [1]

Detailed Description

Format of the TransferData Command Payload. See ZigBee Smart Energy Profile Specification r17, Figure D.40 or D.46.

Definition at line 496 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

Field Documentation

uint16_t _ZclTransferDataPayload_t::tunnelId

A number between 0..65535 that uniquely identifies the tunnel that has been allocated in the server.

Definition at line 500 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint8_t _ZclTransferDataPayload_t::data[1]

Octet containing the data to be transferred through the tunnel in the format of the communication protocol for which the tunnel has been requested. See ZSE Profile Spec. r17, D.6.2.4.3.2 and D.6.2.5.2.2.

Definition at line 504 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.
